evidence_note: Foxconn manufactures iPhone iPad and Mac products for Apple per public filings and earnings disclosures 2017-2018
Broadcom supplies wireless and networking chips to Apple per Broadcom 10-K and Apple supplier list
Foxconn manufactures router and switch hardware for Cisco per Cisco supply chain disclosures
Foxconn manufactures server and PC hardware for Dell per public filings
Broadcom supplies networking and storage controller chips to Dell per Broadcom customer disclosures
Intel supplies processors for Dell PCs and servers per Intel 10-K major customer disclosures
Foxconn manufactures PC and printer hardware for HP per HP supply chain reports
Broadcom supplies networking chips to HP per Broadcom customer disclosures
Intel supplies processors for HP PCs and servers per Intel 10-K major customer disclosures
